data_table.description: Subject ID, sample ID, sample source, source sample ID, and sample use variable obtained from participants with melanoma and involved in the "Melanoma Genome Sequencing Project" project.

variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPID
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: Sample use. Array_SNP: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays; Seq_DNA_SNP_MAF_Sum: Samples were used to generate aggregate mutation annotation file (.maf); Seq_DNA_WholeExome: Whole exome sequencing; Seq_DNA_WholeGenome: Whole genome sequencing; Seq_RNA: Whole transcriptome sequencing
